mapper.select: select ct.user_id ,ct.product_no ,ct.cart_amt ,pd.product_name ,pd.product_price ,pd.product_file from tb_cart ct inner join tb_product pd on pd.product_no = ct.product_no where ct.user_id = #{user_id} order by product_no desc LIMIT #{pageindex}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from tb_cart where user_id = #{user_id} order by product_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from tb_cart where user_id = #{user_id} and product_no = #{product_no}
